mema kriyawaliyedi, apage anshaya wisin nishpadanaya karanu labana wikhadana kadbod (kotuwa, parsalaya) samajayata athyawashya wana karmantha, aahara, pirisidu kirima, saniparakshaka nishpadana saha waidya sapayum wani hadisi pramukhatha awashyatha asurum kirima, prawahanaya kirima saha gabada kirima sandaha yoda gani.

uuwa palath sabhawa yapanaya maha nagara sabhawa saha wawuniyawa nagara sabhawa sandaha mahajana niyojithayan thorapath kara ganimata eeye pawathi chanda wimasima samakamiwa awasan wiya.uuwa palath chanda wimasimedi siyayata 65 chanda prathishathayak da wawuniyawedi siyayata 50 k saha yapanaye siyayata 20 - 30 athara chanda prathishathayak da prakasha wi athi bawa anawaranaya weyi.chanda wimasim eeye ude 7 ta aarambha wi sawasa 4 ta awasan wu athara chanda petti ganan kirim madhyasthanawalata ragena eema in anathuruwa sidu wiya.
